Package peregrine.io

Main IO package including high level IO references.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ChunkStreamListener Read data from a partition from local storage.
InputReference  
JobInput Input for a job which provides a set of key/value pairs.
JobOutput Represents the output stream from a Mapper / Merger job which can write to an emit stream of key/value pairs.
OutputReference  
SequenceReader Interface for reading data from a stream in key/value form.
SequenceWriter Interface for writing data in key/value form.
 

Class Summary
BaseJobInput Read data from a partition from local storage.
BroadcastInput Reader for pulling in broadcast data and exposing the key/value pairs to the consumer.
BroadcastInputFactory Write to a logical partition which is a stream of chunk files....
ExtractWriter Take a given stream of input in the form of (K,V) and route it and write the data to the correct partition.
Input Represents input to the peregrine IO system.
JobOutputFactory Factory for obtaining job output from a given Output definition.
Output Represents job output and constructs references to said output so that we can pass these to the JobOutputFactory.
 

Package peregrine.io Description

Main IO package including high level IO references.
